textBeforeTable: Constants DEFINER AUTHID Provides security for network related PL/SQL packages UTL_TCP, UTL_HTTP, UTL_SMTP, UTL_MAIL, and UTL_INADDR Purpose The Library is currently in the process of being upgraded from Oracle Database Version 12.1.0.1 to 12.1.0.2. Demos are being upgraded to reflect the new Container paradigm as well as EBR (Edition Based Redefinition) and may contain references to CDBs, PDBs, and other objects you may not be familiar with such as CDB_OBJECTS_AE: Welcome to 12c. Interested in Oracle GoldenGate? Check out the IGGOUG, Morgan's Library Page Footer Library Note General Information Oracle DBMS_NETWORK_ACL_ADMIN Version 12.1.0.2
